issue_types.ambiguity: LLM encountered unclear situation and made wrong assumption
issue_types.failure: LLM failed to complete a task correctly
issue_types.correction: User had to redirect or correct LLM behavior

triggers.multiple_clarifications: LLM asked for clarification 2+ times on same topic
triggers.incomplete_response: LLM response was incomplete, required manual intervention

severity_levels.low: Minor inconvenience, workflow continued with small adjustment
severity_levels.medium: Required significant user intervention, slowed workflow
severity_levels.high: Blocked workflow progress, required restart or major correction
